description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 'Hexy Trench' is a fast paced, multiplayer focused game for 1-4 human or AI players. Players will start with a single HQ tile and vie for control of a hexagonal based grid by placing randomly allocated trench tiles to form a trench system.
description.short: 'Hexy Trench' is a fast paced, multiplayer focused game for 1-4 human or AI players. Players will start with a single HQ tile and vie for control of a hexagonal based grid by placing randomly allocated trench tiles to form a trench system.
